question: Who launched the Delhi Common Mobility Card for Delhi metro and DTC buses?
explanation: Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal launched the Delhi Common Mobility Card in New Delhi. With this, Delhi has become first Metro city in the country to have a common mobility card which can be used by commuters in Delhi metro and DTC. The motive behind the launch of this card is to make cashless and convenient commuting for the daily commuters of the National capital. The commuters, who already have the metro card, will be able to use the same for commuting in DTC buses.
